sentences.en: A lieutenant colonel ranks above a major.
sentences.cn: 陆军中校比少校级别高.

sentences.en: As a second lieutenant, he had to salute damned near everybody.
sentences.cn: 身为少尉，他几乎是逢人便得敬礼。

sentences.en: Colonel is the military rank between lieutenant - colonel and brigadier.
sentences.cn: 上校是陆军中校之上、准将之下的军衔.
理查德∙克拉克森空军上尉

sentences.en: Fusilier Jones ran towards the Ops Room to find his lieutenant.
sentences.cn: 燧发枪团士兵琼斯奔向作战指挥室寻找他的中尉长官。

sentences.en: He and Lieutenant Cassidy were checking the scene of the crime.
sentences.cn: 他和卡西迪中尉正在勘查犯罪现场。

sentences.en: He was a second-lieutenant in the army until he deserted.
sentences.cn: 他在擅离部队之前是一名陆军少尉。

sentences.en: He was commissioned as second lieutenant in the Air Force.
He was promoted to be a lieutenant in the army.
I was a naval officer, lieutenant junior grade.
sentences.cn: 我是一名海军中尉军官。

sentences.en: I'm a novice at these things, Lieutenant. You're the professional.
sentences.cn: 中尉，做这些事情我是新手，你是行家。

sentences.en: The colonel advanced him from lieutenant to captain.
sentences.cn: 上校把他从中尉提升为上尉.

sentences.en: The lieutenant stood ahead of the troops.
sentences.cn: 海军上尉站在士兵的面前.

sentences.en: The lieutenant stopped and stood stock-still.
sentences.cn: 上尉停住了，站着一动不动。

sentences.en: You are hereby appointed Sub-Lieutenant RNVR of HMS Tartar.
sentences.cn: 你被任命为皇家海军舰艇“鞑靼人”号的皇家海军志愿后备队中尉。

words.tran_cn: 顾问,密友,代理人,追随者

phrases.tran_cn: [英]陆军中校；[美]陆军或空军、海军陆战队中校

trans.tran_cn: 陆军中尉，副职官员，海军上尉，助理人员
trans.tran_en: someone who does work for, or in place of, someone in a higher position
